ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: that s WHY i picked it..so i could use less mana on attacking  and still have it left for healing (:
ygData.messageBody:
that's WHY i picked it..so i could use less mana on attacking <i like getting
into battle> and still have it left for healing (:

The Scotts wrote:

> From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
>
> Okay this is going to sound harsh man but heres the thing......Why did
> you specialize in Evoke??>>One your not a wizard Two your a class that was
> born to save lives and healing is the only way your going to succeed in
> this. You should have specialized in alteration(hopefully guys thats the
> right one for healing:)P) I know a lvl 43 cleric who has specialized in this
> and the difference is amazing your heals heal more hpts, faster casting very
> rarely does he not recover if hit when healing and it takes only close to
> half the mana that a cleric who doesn't specialize uses. The results are
> amazing at higfher lvls. However man dont think im gripping at you because i
> have read your other mails and you know what your talking about. Its just i
> would have picked the healing specialization....but now that I think about
> it man your undead spells will be much much more efficient so maybe it was a
> good choice. Now if you would have oicked something like divination or
> conjuring we would have a really really big problem on our hands. Well
> thanks for hearing me out man...Later and goodluck.
>
> Krix Mathar
>
> Guardians of Lore
> P.S. The way it goes is when you specialize you can specialize in all your
> fields but the first one to go over 50 is the one you will be the best at
> and amy keep going up in all the others can not go past 50..
